YogaFrost


About

YogaFrost was a donation-based online event in February 2021 hosted by YogaFest at Song of the Morning. Presenters sent in pre-recorded yoga video programs that were livestreamed over three days for over 500 people. The goal of the event was to bring together the yoga community and raise money for Song of the Morning Yoga Retreat over the pandemic shut-down.

My Role:

I was the creator and coordinator for YogaFrost, managing everything from presenter communication and marketing to video editing and livestream hosting. From a design end, I crafted a whimsical winter-themed logo and other graphics for use on social media and during the livestreamed event.

Design Focus:

  • Logo Design
  • Marketing
  • Motion
  • Video Assets
  • Livestreaming
  • Video Editing

Tools:

  • Illustrator
  • Photoshop
  • InDesign
  • Davinci Resolve
  • OBS Studio
  • YouTube Live

Logo Design

The logo is based on a bridge on the Song of the Morning property encapsuled in a snow-globe to invoke the winter theme of the event. The design was also printed onto tote bags that were sold to attendees. I chose to use a handdrawn font to give the text a fantastical feel.


Video & Marketing Assets

As a livestreamed event, it was important to display program information during and between video presentations. Using the logo graphic as a base, I compiled a few variations for use in title slides and animated transition clips.
